Bought this for our house at our farm. It's fantastic. Has lots of storage space for a family of three-four. The plastics and glass inside are of really good quality. Ours runs off a solar panel system without any issues. My biggest concern was whether there going to be a lock on the door of the refrigerator or not and there was. One of the key features I have to admit. Makes it easier when the refrigerator is to be installed in a place where you want to control access to it.
